title: Determining lens type and focal length

content.question: On an optical bench, a student places a small screen and a light source <math alttext="54 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>54</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> apart. The student then slowly moves a lens along the optical bench from the light source toward the screen. The student measures distances of <math alttext="18 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>18</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> and <math alttext="36 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>36</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> between the lens and the light source at two locations where a clear image is produced on the screen. What kind of lens did the student use, and what is the focal length of the lens?

choices.label: A converging lens with a focal length of <math alttext="12 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

A converging lens with a focal length of <math alttext="36 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mtext>36</mtext><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

A diverging lens with a focal length of <math alttext="12 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

A diverging lens with a focal length of <math alttext="36 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>36</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: A converging lens with a focal length of <math alttext="12 centimeters" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>12</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.4em"></mspace><mtext>cm</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>
